body:
I've seen many players using it, and I decided to try. Can anyone tell me about it and basically explain me what it is?
A link to download it would be great :)

title: Motion Blur for MC

replies.body: Basically makes the game smoother. Doesn't help that much but it helps for a more smooth gameplay.
replies.body_tagged: Basically makes the game smoother. Doesn't help that much but it helps for a more smooth gameplay.

replies.body: Umm, if there is someone using it, can you send me a link that I can download?
